rules_text:
At the beginning of each end step, if you lost life this turn, put a blessing counter on Grace of God.
If a source would deal damage to you for the first time each turn, prevent up to X of that damage, where X is the number of blessing counters on Grace of God.
flavor_text: [i]Not all born in the darkness are unworthy.[/i]
notes: fluffy: the first time you would be dealt damage this turn —> if a source would deal damage to you for the first time each turn (https://scryfall.com/search?q=o%3A%22the+first+time%22+o%3A%22would%22&unique=cards&as=grid&order=set, Gonti's Machinations, Shield of the Realm)
